mapper.insert: insert into hzs_user (hsu_id, hsu_name, hsu_account, hsu_password, hsr_id, email, mobile, img_id, crt_id, crt_name, crt_time, mdf_id, mdf_name, mdf_time) values (#{hsuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsuAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mdfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdfTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hzs_user set hsu_name = #{hsuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hsu_account = #{hsuAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hsu_password = #{hsuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hsr_id = #{hsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_id = #{crtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_name = #{crtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_time = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mdf_id = #{mdfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mdf_name = #{mdfName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mdf_time = #{mdfTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where hsu_id = #{hsuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select hsu_id, hsu_name, hsu_account, hsu_password, hsr_id, email, mobile, img_id, crt_id, crt_name, crt_time, mdf_id, mdf_name, mdf_time from hzs_user where hsu_id = #{hsuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select hsu_id, hsu_name, hsu_account, hsu_password, hsr_id, email, mobile, img_id, crt_id, crt_name, crt_time, mdf_id, mdf_name, mdf_time from hzs_user
